creator: thorsten@apache.org
text:
I tested to delete a doc in 1.4. and the result was a suprise.

You can delete a page but it will as well delete the parent document if
no other page is linked from the parent.
For the record, i think i just saw the same issue. Made my day :-D
creator: nettings@apache.org

text:
fixed in rev 388164.
anybody wants to test?
creator: josias.thoeny@wyona.org

text: your patch seems to fix the problem for me. thanks!
creator: nettings@apache.org
